metadata.description: A curated collection of productivity skills for Claude Code following the Explore-Plan-Implement workflow. Includes tools for codebase exploration, tech-stack detection, planning, validation, implementation, and API documentation generation.

plugins.name: explore-codebase
plugins.description: Explores the codebase to gather context for a specific task or feature without making changes. Uses read-only tools to map architecture and identify patterns.

plugins.name: confirm-tech-stack
plugins.description: Identifies the technologies used in the current project and asks the user to confirm which ones to use for a specific task. Prevents costly wrong-stack implementations.

plugins.name: advanced-plan
plugins.description: Creates a detailed, step-by-step implementation plan using Explore-Plan-Implement best practices. Coordinates tech-stack confirmation, codebase exploration, and plan validation.

plugins.name: validate-plan
plugins.description: Validates a structured implementation plan for completeness, identifies gaps in requirements, and generates clarifying questions for the user before coding begins.

plugins.name: implement-plan
plugins.description: Implements a previously agreed-upon plan with parallel subagent coordination, test writing, and iterative course-correction.

plugins.name: generate-openapi
plugins.description: Analyzes code and generates comprehensive OpenAPI 3.x specs that can be used directly with OpenAPI MCP servers. Produces fully compliant YAML/JSON with realistic examples.
